title: San Francisco/The Avenues
name: Arizmendi Bakery
directions: between Irving St and Judah St
content: This is a great, popular co-op bakery and pizzeria. One kind of pizza per day, which is almost always delicious. The bakery includes traditional items like muffins, scones, and crumb cake (in a home-made style) as well as off-beat items like "chocolate things."
